content: *p1 k2 repeat from * to end of round round 11 *p1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round cut yarn leaving a 6 -28cm tail using a tapestry needle pull tail through remaining stitches finishing weave in ends pattern designed for the echoview fiber mill by christina danaee pattern is intended for unlimited personal use please do not reproduce or sell this pattern or sell items that are knitting from it please find more patterns and kits like this yarn and knitting supplies at www echoviewnc com or email ggouin@ehoviewnc com for more information
